Source.Name: iperf
Source.Summary: A TCP, UDP, and SCTP network bandwidth measurement tool
Source.Description: iperf is a tool for active measurements of the maximum achievable bandwidth on IP networks. It supports tuning of various parameters related to timing, protocols, and buffers. For each test it reports the bandwidth, loss, and other parameters.
